thread.section_title: Figo Pet Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Figo Pet Insurance | figopetinsurance.com
thread.title: Sandra Lee
thread.title_full: Figo Pet Insurance reviewed by Sandra Lee

author: Sandra Lee
title: Sandra Lee
text:
Katy Kilroy was great in explaining everything about Figo insurance for
my newly adopted dog. Prior to
calling Figo, I spoke with a rep from
another insurance co. who was
incredibly unhelpful. I was encouaged
to speak with Katy, who was not
only informative but answered all my
questions and gave me some helpful
hints. Thank you, Figo, I look forward
to signing in with you!
